key.name: customlogfiles
key.description: It is null by default. To display extra logs in Log Viewer, please configure the absolute path of the corresponding log file. And make sure the operator has permission to read it.For example: ['a.log', 'b.log', 'c.log']

key.name: coredumpreporttime
key.description: It is null by default. Record the time point of the last successful crash report, used to achieve incremental escalation
